byline: Candace Manriquez, Barbara Bogaev, Nick White and Kaitlin Funaro
teaser: This weekend on Marketplace Money, guest host Barbara Bogaev talks with Travis Dorsch, sports psychologist and professor at Utah State University about how overspending on kids’ sports can lead to a decrease in the child’s enjoyment and motivation to play sports. Certified Financial Planner Louis Barajas stops by to help answer listeners’ financial questions and Ryan Lile, founder of Savvy Traveler and Frequent Flyer Academy shows us how to maximize our frequent flyer rewards while minimizing the headache of booking a flight. Then, Nicole Williams and Barbara Bogaev talk about common mistakes made on LinkedIn and how the platform differs from a traditional resume. Finally, comedian Hari Kondabolu talks about how Monopoly changed his life.
